name: Bombs and Wallls
description:
# Please read how-to-play in game!

This is a game that was made for the Wowie Jam. https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam
How to play is in the game

Also, please play with other people if you can. This game is designed to be 2 player game. Although I have implemented a simple AI, it is very bad, and you won't experience the strategic element of the game. So Please Please Please, play with other people
